div.p: The Omaha System provides standardized terms, definitions, and codes for observations and procedures, specifically for client problems, multidisciplinary interventions including those focusing on assessment and care, and problem-specific client outcomes.

description.value: The Omaha System provides standardized terms, definitions, and codes for observations and procedures, specifically for client problems, multidisciplinary interventions including those focusing on assessment and care, and problem-specific client outcomes.
